- Created ranked leaderboard with medals for top 3
- Updated excelReader.js to handle both Google Sheets and local Excel files
- Modified all command files (data, search, sheets, stats) for async operations
- Updated README with new features and Google Sheets setup
- Added .env.example with Google Sheets configuration
